<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lifesense](/Feats.aspx?ID=1370) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a limited ability to sense life force, like your [psychopomp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=83) forebears. You gain [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) as an imprecise sense with a range of 10 feet. This allows you to sense the life force within living creatures and its counterforce that animates the undead, though you can't distinguish between the two.
name: Lifesense
